modules.name: Data Ingestion
modules.description: Collect and preprocess customer feedback data from multiple sources

modules.name: Machine Learning
modules.description: Train and deploy AI models for sentiment analysis

modules.name: Data Analytics
modules.description: Generate real-time analytics and visualizations for business decision-making

modules.name: API Gateway
modules.description: Handle incoming requests and route them to the appropriate backend services

modules.name: Dashboard
modules.description: Display real-time analytics and sentiment analysis results to users

data_flow.description: Customer feedback data is collected from multiple sources and stored in a PostgreSQL database. The data is then processed and pre-trained AI models are trained using Scikit-learn and TensorFlow. The trained models are deployed as AWS Lambda functions. The API Gateway handles incoming requests and routes them to the appropriate backend services. The backend services use FastAPI to generate real-time analytics and visualizations, which are then displayed in the React.js-based dashboard.
